channel.title: AERA on James Uanhoro
channel.description: Recent content in AERA on James Uanhoro

item.title: AERA 2023 Presentation: Modeling misspecification as a parameter in Bayesian SEMs
item.description: Presentation Please find a copy of the AERA 2023 SEM SIG presentation here: Manuscript And a version of the manuscript here: The Open Science Framework repository for code in the paper is: https://osf.io/29ydb/ R package The following links all have installation instructions: package website: https://jamesuanhoro.github.io/minorbsem/ r-universe: https://jamesuanhoro.r-universe.dev/minorbsem GitHub: https://github.com/jamesuanhoro/minorbsem/ Please reach out to me if you run into any problems during installation, package use. Older blog post about the package: The minorbsem package in R
